parsedComplaintsResult.impact: The failure of the heater core can cause hot coolant to leak inside the vehicle, potentially leading to severe burns, loss of control, and accidents.
symptoms: Hot coolant leaking from underneath the dashboard
hot antifreeze leaking inside the vehicle
and burns on the driver's legs.

parsedComplaintsResult.impact: The failure of the windshield wipers can cause reduced visibility, leading to accidents or near-miss incidents.
symptoms: Windshield wipers unable to clean the window
fumes or fog remaining on the windshield

parsedComplaintsResult.impact: Unintended acceleration can cause loss of vehicle control, accidents, and potentially lead to serious injuries or fatalities.
symptoms: The vehicle accelerates on its own
and may not respond to braking input. This can occur while shifting into gear
or when the vehicle is stationary.

parsedComplaintsResult.impact: The failure of the airbag system can lead to a failure to deploy in the event of a crash, increasing the risk of injury or fatality.
symptoms: The SRS (Supplemental Restraint System) light comes on during startup and stays on
the airbag fails to deploy in the event of a crash.
